title: rustup.sh hash doesn't match, failed install
body:
I can't install the nightly from the rustup.sh script:

```
rustup: CFG_CURL             := /usr/bin/curl (7.40.0)
rustup: CFG_TAR              := /usr/bin/tar (1.28)
rustup: CFG_FILE             := /usr/bin/file (5.22)
rustup: CFG_SHA256SUM        := /usr/bin/sha256sum (256sum)
rustup: CFG_SHASUM           := /usr/bin/core_perl/shasum (5.88)
rustup: 
rustup: processing sh args
rustup: 
rustup: CFG_PREFIX           :=  
rustup: CFG_DATE             :=  
rustup: 
rustup: validating sh args
rustup: 
rustup: host triple: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
rustup: Downloading https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/rust-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz to /tmp/tmp.56F433crVd/rust-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
100  125M  100  125M    0     0   770k      0  0:02:46  0:02:46 --:--:-- 1349kc
rustup: Downloading https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/rust-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz.sha256
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
100   111  100   111    0     0     65      0  0:00:01  0:00:01 --:--:--    65
rustup: Verifying hash
rustup: error: invalid sha256.\n 0c1e70b3f451249e5ebbf51707577bd37d5be2b7d7568f343c05795647e85cbb\thttps://static.rust-lang.org/dist/rust-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz\n d2493fb535a122730a19d0f738f2952454b0e1f41f205063780e061d7a76924e\t/tmp/tmp.56F433crVd/rust-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz
```

Also, when I install from the AUR, I get the nightly from 1-25. I think the nightly wasn't updated properly.
